It seems like your input is not related to a database query. Could you please provide a specific question or request regarding the database?

is_related_to_database = False

My purpose is to assist you in converting natural language queries into PostgreSQL queries based on the database metadata provided. If you have any questions or requests related to the database, feel free to ask!
give me all suppliers that supply the same parts

is_related_to_database = True

Here is the PostgreSQL query to retrieve all suppliers that supply the same parts:

```sql
SELECT supplier, item_name
FROM inventory
GROUP BY supplier, item_name
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
``` 

This query will list suppliers along with the items they supply, focusing on those that supply the same parts.
give me all suppliers that supply the same parts

is_related_to_database = True

Here is the PostgreSQL query to retrieve all suppliers that supply the same parts:

```sql
SELECT supplier, item_name
FROM inventory
GROUP BY supplier, item_name
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
```

This query will list suppliers along with the items they supply, focusing on those that supply the same parts.

Your previous query was: "give me all suppliers that supply the same parts." If you have any further questions or need assistance with another query, feel free to ask!

is_related_to_database = False

Hello! How can I assist you today? If you have any questions or requests related to the database, feel free to let me know!

is_related_to_database = False

I can help you by converting your natural language queries into PostgreSQL queries based on the database metadata provided. If you have any specific questions or requests regarding the database, please let me know, and I'll assist you!
give me all those suppliers that supply the same part

is_related_to_database = True

Here is the PostgreSQL query to retrieve all suppliers that supply the same part:

```sql
SELECT item_name, ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT supplier) AS suppliers
FROM inventory
GROUP BY item_name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT supplier) > 1;
```

This query will list each part along with an array of suppliers that supply that part, focusing on those parts that have more than one supplier.
